text: allah adahas kara tibune nam, ovunva (ekama dharmayak anugamanaya karana) ekama samuhayak bavata pat karannata ida tibuni. (ehet siyallangema gati gunayan ekama akarayakata tibune næta). ebævin (taman) kæmati (hondak karana) ayavama tama dayavehi ohu ætulu karanneya. (papayan karana) aparadhakarayinva (durmargayehi athæra damanneya). ovunva araksa karannanda næta. udav karannanda næta
